pr_title: Hide vanished players from server ping and other fixes

timeline.message:
Hide vanished players from server ping
Along with:
* Disallow /report being used on vanished players
* Fix a NPE with AntiGriefListener
* Adjust /setnext staff broadcast

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:

Maybe I should add a note in case we ever switch command frameworks?
See here for details.
